meanings.definition: A type of orchid with showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: The odontoglossum in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I bought a lovely odontoglossum for my mom's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The odontoglossum wore a tiny top hat at the flower show.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as an odontoglossum in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the odontoglossum danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The genus of orchids to which the odontoglossums belong.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the odontoglossum genus to learn more about orchids.
meanings.sent2: The odontoglossum genus includes many different species.
meanings.sent3: In the odontoglossum family reunion, each orchid wore a name tag.
meanings.sent4: The odontoglossum genus is a treasure trove of floral diversity.
meanings.sent5: Each odontoglossum in the genus has its own unique charm.
